checks.description: Verify navigation to Daily Wage Calculation page from Settings > Payroll
checks.selector_hint: Settings menu, Payroll submenu, Daily Wage Calculation link
checks.assertion: Page loads with Daily Wage Calculation configuration interface visible

checks.description: Verify calculation basis options exist (calendar days, working days, custom days)
checks.selector_hint: Calculation basis selector, radio buttons or dropdown for day type selection
checks.assertion: All three calculation basis options are available and selectable

checks.description: Verify salary components selection controls exist
checks.selector_hint: Salary components section, checkboxes or multi-select for component inclusion
checks.assertion: Salary components can be selected/deselected for calculation inclusion

checks.description: Verify help text or labels explain calculation basis impact
checks.selector_hint: Information text near calculation basis options, tooltips or descriptions
checks.assertion: Text indicates that calculation method affects final wage calculations

nav.canonical: Settings > Payroll > End of Service eligibility > Configure

checks.description: Verify navigation to End of Service eligibility configuration
checks.selector_hint: Settings menu, Payroll submenu, End of Service eligibility, Configure button
checks.assertion: End of Service configuration page loads successfully

checks.description: Verify salary component options (Basic Only vs Basic + Allowances)
checks.selector_hint: Salary components selection, radio buttons or dropdown for component choice
checks.assertion: Both Basic Only and Basic + Allowances options are available

checks.description: Verify calculation method options (calendar, working, custom days)
checks.selector_hint: Calculation method selector, radio buttons or dropdown for day type
checks.assertion: All three calculation method options are selectable

checks.description: Verify override indicator visible for eligible paid leave-type policies
checks.selector_hint: Leave type configuration section, override warning or indicator text
checks.assertion: Super admin can see which eligible paid leave-type policies will be overwritten

checks.description: Verify navigation to Daily wage calculation for proration settings
checks.selector_hint: Settings menu, Payroll submenu, Daily wage calculation link
checks.assertion: Daily wage calculation page accessible for proration configuration

checks.description: Verify calculation basis options for proration (custom, calendar, working days)
checks.selector_hint: Calculation bases selector, radio buttons or dropdown
checks.assertion: All three calculation basis options available for proration

checks.description: Verify warning or notice about payroll month impact on prorated transactions
checks.selector_hint: Alert or notice section, warning message about open payroll months
checks.assertion: Message indicates changes affect all active unpaid amounts in payroll table

nav.canonical: Settings > Leaves > Leave Policies > Add new policy > Unpaid Leave option > calculation method > day calculation type

checks.description: Verify navigation to Leave Policies configuration for unpaid leave
checks.selector_hint: Settings menu, Leaves submenu, Leave Policies, Add new policy option
checks.assertion: Leave policy creation interface accessible

checks.description: Verify override indicator shows payroll daily wage calculator takes precedence
checks.selector_hint: Unpaid Leave option section, formula field, greyed-out or disabled state indicator
checks.assertion: Formula field displays greyed-out or disabled state indicating payroll override

checks.description: Verify UI state shows formula is overridden by payroll settings
checks.selector_hint: Calculation method section, visual indicator of override status
checks.assertion: UI clearly indicates payroll-side daily wage calculator overrides leave policy formula

nav.canonical: Settings > Leaves > Leave Policies > Add new policy > Unpaid Leave option > calculation method > day calculation type

checks.description: Verify navigation to unpaid leave deduction configuration
checks.selector_hint: Settings menu, Leaves submenu, Leave Policies, policy creation flow
checks.assertion: Unpaid leave deduction configuration interface accessible

checks.description: Verify override indicator shows global configuration supersedes policy-level settings
checks.selector_hint: Unpaid Leave option section, calculation method field, disabled or greyed indicator
checks.assertion: UI indicates global unpaid leave daily rate configuration takes precedence

checks.description: Verify UI state reflects configuration hierarchy (global > policy-level)
checks.selector_hint: Calculation method section, visual state of configuration controls
checks.assertion: UI shows policy-level customization is limited by global configuration

nav.canonical: Settings > Payroll > End of Service eligibility > Configure

checks.description: Verify navigation to End of Service eligibility configuration
checks.selector_hint: Settings menu, Payroll submenu, End of Service eligibility, Configure
checks.assertion: EOS configuration page loads successfully

checks.description: Verify UI displays daily wage formula configuration (basic + allowances / 30)
checks.selector_hint: Salary Components section, Calculation Method section, formula display or label
checks.assertion: Daily wage formula configuration is visible and correctly displayed

checks.description: Verify UI shows stored daily rate or calculation basis
checks.selector_hint: EOS configuration section, daily rate field or calculation basis display
checks.assertion: Stored daily rate or calculation method is displayed in UI

nav.canonical: Settings > Leaves > Leave Policies > Add new policy > Unpaid Leave option > calculation method > day calculation type

checks.description: Verify navigation to leave salary calculation configuration
checks.selector_hint: Settings menu, Leaves submenu, Leave Policies, policy creation flow
checks.assertion: Leave salary calculation configuration interface accessible

checks.description: Verify override indicator shows daily rate configuration takes precedence
checks.selector_hint: Calculation method section, day calculation type field, override indicator
checks.assertion: UI indicates daily rate configuration overrides standard calculation method

checks.description: Verify UI state shows configured daily rate divisor (30, 31, or calendar-based)
checks.selector_hint: Day calculation type section, divisor value or configuration display
checks.assertion: Configured daily rate divisor is visible and indicates calculation basis

nav.canonical: Settings > Leaves > Leave Policies > Add new policy > Unpaid Leave option > calculation method > day calculation type

checks.description: Verify navigation to unpaid leave deduction remarks configuration
checks.selector_hint: Settings menu, Leaves submenu, Leave Policies, policy creation flow
checks.assertion: Unpaid leave configuration interface accessible

checks.description: Verify UI displays remarks field showing daily rate and days calculation
checks.selector_hint: Unpaid Leave option section, remarks field or calculation display
checks.assertion: Remarks field displays daily rate calculation with day count reference

checks.description: Verify UI shows calendar days detection in remarks (e.g., 29 for February leap year)
checks.selector_hint: Remarks section, day count display, calendar-aware calculation indicator
checks.assertion: Remarks accurately reflect actual calendar days for the month

nav.canonical: Settings > Leaves > Leave Policies > Add new policy > Unpaid Leave option > calculation method > day calculation type

checks.description: Verify navigation to unpaid leave daily rate configuration
checks.selector_hint: Settings menu, Leaves submenu, Leave Policies, policy creation flow
checks.assertion: Unpaid leave configuration interface accessible

checks.description: Verify UI displays stored daily rate from leave occurrence month
checks.selector_hint: Unpaid Leave option section, daily rate display field, stored rate indicator
checks.assertion: Daily rate displayed is from leave occurrence month, not payroll processing month

checks.description: Verify remarks show initially calculated daily rate preserved across payroll cycles
checks.selector_hint: Remarks section, daily rate value display, consistency indicator
checks.assertion: Remarks consistently display the initially calculated daily rate
